pages.text: $(#008cff)Lavender$() is a very common plant in The Aurorian! It's harvested using a Sickle, and can be planted and farmed by turning it into $(#008cff)Lavender Seeds$().

pages.name: Lavender Tea
pages.text: $(#008cff)Lavender$() can also be made into tea that gives a short resistance buff.
